topics.body: I want Funimation to go back, and try again with their US Release of that DBZ Movie. Seriously, DBZ is not like Evangelion where you can get away with hiding it at smaller (i.e. not part of NCM (AMC/Regal/Cinemark)) theaters. It's DBZ, people will pay money to watch it. especially in IMAX.

topics.body:
Morning.
Just got a message from the Education Department that literally says "The results have yet to be released. Please check-" and stuff. At first, I was confused by this message. It says about the results haven't been released and I'm just wondering why it would send a message like that. But then, my mom told me that probably a lot of parents called and were worried about their children's results so this message was to reassure all of them including others.

So, yeah.
